item.title: hahah. doh. i mean.. umm..
item.description: so apparently some people didn’t appreciate the.. umm.. spoilers in my last post.. sorry about that. i will uhh.. hide them. ;-) i guess yall should read faster. i gave you a week headstart. wtf.
